attributes.action: Halt cutting down trees, we should start using stone paper instead(eco-friendly)
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government or parliament to take care of this as they have the power and voice to change the law or add to the law. I believe this will be the best way to take a massive step to being more eco-friendly and doing our part to stop Global Warming. We can also save 16,000 gallons of water and 20 trees for each ton of stone paper products. My main goal is to make our country more eco-friendly.
attributes.background: I want the government to stop the cutting down of trees for paper in our country and start producing, using and making Stone paper instead. I believe this will make our country be more eco friendly as it uses less water, energy and has low carbon emmisions making it better for global warming.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the use of trees to make paper, but it's not clear if you want the Government to ban the felling of all trees, or the production and/or sale of paper produced using wood pulp.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Automatically give all trees protection with tree preservation orders: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637544
